resources.string: This app lets you enjoy audio files from your device’s storage. To do that, it needs your permission to access your storage
Oops some unknown error has occurred.
If you enjoy using Audiofy, please take a moment and rate it 5 stars on app store. Thanks for your support \nTap to rate.
You can enjoy the best of Audiofy by updating to the latest version. The new version has improved features, fixed bugs, and increased performance that will make your audio more enjoyable.
Have feedback? We\'d love to hear it, but please don\'t share sensitive information.

Thank you for using this app. I am an individual developer who loves to create useful and beautiful apps. I need your support to keep developing this app and make it better. You can support me by buying the app or rating it 5 stars on the store. Your feedback is also very valuable to me. Please share your thoughts and suggestions with me. I appreciate your help and encouragement.
We appreciate your support for the app. If you love it, please share it with your friends, family and WhatsApp groups. Remember, sharing is caring!
Media Library\n Let\'s make the magic happen.
We\'re working hard to bring this feature to you. Please check back soon for updates.
The track will be removed shortly.
Oops! It seems there was an error while trying to remove the track.
Warning: You are about to delete %d files permanently. This cannot be undone. Click ‘Delete’ or the message will cancel itself.

Warning: You are about to trash %d files. Deleted files will be moved to the trashcan and can be restored within 30 days. After 30 days, files in the trashcan will be permanently deleted. Click ‘Trash’ or the message will cancel itself.
Oops! An error occurred while deleting audio files
A dialog is about to be shown. please confirm to delete the files
The deleting of files was cancelled by the user.
The %1$s/%2$s files from the storage have been successfully deleted.
Please note that adding to queue is an experimental feature and it may not work properly when shuffle mode is on.

plurals.name: queue_update_msg
plurals.item: The items are either in the queue already or some error has occurred while adding.
%d/%d item has been successfully added to the playlist. Enjoy your music!
%d/%d items have been successfully added to the playlist. Enjoy your music!

resources.string: Select the app theme: dark, light, or follow the system settings.
Enjoy a more immersive view without the status bar.
Increase or decrease the accent color usage in the app.
Only tracks longer than this duration (in seconds) will be added to the library.
"Set the maximum number of tracks that should be stored in the playlist history."
Faster artwork loading time, but can show incorrect artwork
Only available on Android 11 and above, when enabled, deleted tracks are moved to a Trash Can folder instead of being permanently deleted.
Tracks from the blacklist folders will be hidden from your library.
When enabled, there will be no gaps or pauses between tracks during playback.
The duration (in seconds) of cross fading effect between tracks during playback.
You are about to add %1$s to the blacklist. You can unblock it later from the settings. This message will be automatically cancelled if you do not wish to proceed.
%1$s has been added to the blacklist. To unblock, go to the settings and remove it from there.
No items have been added to the blacklist yet. Add folders or files to it by long-pressing them in FolderView.
No third-party or built-in equalizer found. Please download a third-party equalizer from the market to enhance your audio experience.
